snippet: The bodies of nine men, one of them hanging from a bridge and all shot in the head, were found Friday in Nuevo Laredo, across from Laredo, Tex., the authorities said.
abstract: Bodies of nine men, one of them hanging from a bridge and all shot in the head, are found in Nuevo Laredo, Mexico, latest crime to occur after leader of Gulf Cartel was captured by the Mexican Navy.
lead_paragraph: The bodies of nine men, one of them hanging from a bridge and all shot in the head, were found Friday in Nuevo Laredo, across from Laredo, Tex., the authorities said.
